Verses: 1 niyaayaadhibadhigal Niyaayam Visaariththuvarum Naatkalil, Dhesaththile Panjam Undaayitru; Appozhudhu Yoodhaavilulla Bethleem Ooraanaagiya Oru Manushan Than Manaiviyodum Irandu Kumaararodumkooda Movaab Dhesaththile Poich Sanjariththaan.

2 andha Manushanudaiya Per Elimelekku, Avan Manaiviyin Per Nakomi, Avanudaiya Irandu Kumaararil Oruvan Per Maklon, Matroruvan Per Kiliyon; Yoodhaavilulla Bethlekem Ooraagiya Eppiraaththiyaraagiya Avargal Movaapdhesaththirkup Poi, Ange Irundhuvittaargal.
3 nakomiyin Purushanaagiya Elimelekku Irandhuponaan; Avalum Avaludaiya Irandu Kumaararum Maaththiram Irundhaargal.
4 ivaragal Movaabiyaril Pen Kondaargal; Avargalil Oruththi Per Orpaal, Matraval Per Rooth; Ange Erakkuraiyap Paththuvarusham Vaasampanninaargal.
5 pinbu Maklon Kiliyon Ennum Avargal Iruvarum Irandhuponaargal; Andha Sthiree Than Kumaarar Iruvaraiyum Than Purushanaiyum Izhandhu Thaniththavalaanaal.
6 karththar Thammudaiya Janangalai Sandhiththu, Avargalukku Aagaaram Arulinaar Endru Aval Movaabdhesaththile Kelvippattu, Than Marumakkalodekooda Movaap Dhesaththilirundhu Thirumbivarumbadi Ezhundhu,
7 than Irandu Marumakkalodungoodath Thaanirundha Sthalaththai Vittu Purappattaal. Yoodhaadhesaththirku Thirumbippoga, Avargal Vazhinadakkaiyil,

8 nagomi Than Irandu Marumakkalaiyum Nokki: Neengal Iruvarum Ungal Thaaiveettukku Thirumbippongal; Mariththupponavargalukkum Enakkum Neengal Dhayaiseydhadhupola,karththar Ungalukkum Dhayaiseyvaaraaga.

9 karththar Ungal Iruvarukkum Vaaikkum Purushanudaiya Veettile Neengal Sugamaai Vaazhndhirukka Seyvaaraaga Endru Solli, Avargalai Muththamittaal. Appozhudhu Avargal Saththamittu Azhudhu, Avalaip Paarththu:
10 ummudaiya Janaththandaikke Ummudankooda Varuvom Endraargal.
11 adharku Nagomi: En Makkale, Neengal Thirumbippongal; Ennode Yen Varugireergal? Ungalukku Purusharaagumbadikku, Inimel En Karppaththile Enakku Pillaigal Undaagumo?

12 en Makkale, Thirumbippongal; Naan Vayadhusendraval; Oru Purushanudan Vaazhaththakkavalalla; Appadippatta Nambikkai Enakku Undaayirundhu, Naan Indru Iravil Oru Purushanukku Vaazhkkaippattu, Pillaigalaip Petraalum,

13 avargal Periyavargalaagumattum Purusharukku Vaazhkkaippadaadhabadikku Neengal Poruththiruppeergalo? Adhu Koodaadhu; En Makkale, Karththarudaiya Kai Enakku Virodhamaayirukkiradhinaal, Ungalnimiththam Enakku Migundha Visanam Irukkiradhu Endraal.
14 appozhudhu Avargal Saththamittu Adhigamaai Azhudhaargal; Orpaal Than Maamiyai Muththamittupponaal; Rooththo Avalai Vidaamal Patrik Kondaal.
15 appozhudhu Aval: Idho, Un Sagodhari Than Janangalidaththukkum Than Dhevargalidaththukkum Thirumbi Poivittaale; Neeyum Un Sagodhariyin Pirage Thirumbippo Endraal.

16 adharku Rooth: Naan Ummai Pinpatraamal Ummaivittuth Thirumbi Povadhaikkuriththu, Ennode Pesavendaam; Neer Pogum Idaththirku Naanum Varuven; Neer Thangum Idaththile Naanum Thanguven; Ummudaiya Janam Ennudaiya Janam; Ummudaiya Dhevan Ennudaiya Dhevan.

17 neer Maranamadaiyum Idaththil Naanum Maranamadaindhu, Ange Adakkampannappaduven; Maranameyallaamal Verondrum Ummai Vittu Ennai Piriththaal, Karththaradharku Sariyaagavum Adharku Adhigamaagavum Enakku Seyyakkadavar Endraal.
18 aval Thannodekooda Vara Mana Urudhiyaayirukkiradhai Kandu, Appuram Adhaikkuriththu Avalode Ondrum Pesavillai.
19 appadiye Iruvarum Bedhlegem Mattum Nadandhuponaargal; Avargal Bedhlegemukku Vandhapodhu, Ooraar Ellaarum Avargalai Kuriththu Aachchariyappattu, Ival Nagomiyo Endru Pesikkondaargal.
20 adharku Aval: Neengal Ennai Nagomi Endru Sollaamal, Maaraal Endru Sollungal; Sarvavallavar Enakku Migundha Kasappai Kattalaiyittaar.

21 naan Niraivullavalaai Ponen; Karththar Ennai Verumaiyaai Thirumbivarappanninaar; Karththar Ennai Sirumaippaduththi, Sarvavallavar Ennai Kilesappaduththiyirukkaiyil, Neengal Ennai Nagomi Enbaanen Endraal.
22 ippadi Nagomi Movaabiya Sthireeyaana Than Marumagal Rooththodunkooda Movaab Dhesaththilirundhu Thirumbivandhaal; Vaarkodhumai Aruppin Thuvakkaththil Avargal Bedhlegemukku Vandhaargal.
